articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Champions League Final 2022 Highlights: Real Madrid win record-extending title - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Champions League Final 2022 Highlights, Liverpool vs Real Madrid: Madrid beat Liverpool 1-0 to win European club football's most prestigious prize. Follow Highlights of the LIV vs RMA Match Today at Stade de France in Paris.
articles.content:
Real Madrid, inspired by Karim Benzema, have announced their team early. As expected, they will play a 4-3-3 combination.
Real Madrid XI: Courtois; Carvajal, Eder Militao, Alaba, Mendy; Kroos, Casem… [+168 chars]

articles.title: LIVE Champions League final: Liverpool, Real Madrid clash in Paris - ESPN
articles.description: Will Real Madrid win a record-extending 14th European crown? Can Liverpool avenge defeat in the 2018 final? Follow ESPN's LIVE coverage to find out!
articles.content:
Welcome to ESPN's LIVE coverage of the 2021-22 Champions League final! Premier League giants Liverpool take on LaLiga champions Real Madrid in a repeat of the 2018 final.

articles.author: RFE/RL
articles.title: 'Final' Agreement Makes Abramovich Sale Of Chelsea Soccer Club Highest Ever - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: English Premier League club Chelsea said on May 28 that a "final and definitive agreement" concluded overnight should clear the way for the sports world's highest-ever team sale amid sanctions on Chelsea's billionaire Russian owner.
